title: Vvang
author: Vvang
content: Gala games are working towards Gala Music and Gala Movies do you think that this project can hit 1$ per token some day? I dont see any slacking with their development.

comments.author: bonyaserg
comments.body: Personally, I believe that the Gala Games project is working on gala music and gala films and can have great potential for developing a successful business. This will allow the project to become the leader of the crypto industry for all Gala participants to create the most efficient business among the largest projects. And in the future, the Gala token will be able to show an excellent result.

comments.author: DevFile90
comments.body: Gala games is worth the risk, this platform is going to bring many games together I'm a box like steam, some will be successful and some won't but the project will be able to create huge awareness from this, its a must have alt in anyone's crypto portfolio.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: 1$ per gala token is possible but there is something I don't like about this project, the max supply keeps growing, maybe I don't understand how the tokenomics works but unlimited max supply sucks in every way, the project needs to acquire lots of adoption for the token to hit 1$, I prefer limited supply.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: Cosidering the total supply of GALA, $1 is quite impossible as of the moment, because if they do it only means that GALA will surpass a lot of projects right now in the top 10 list based on the marketcap. With that kind of development, I don't think it's enough to push a project on such price with a lot of total supply circulating in the market, additionally there's also a problem with their ecosystem that needs to be address first. GALA is one of the top performer games last year, and right now they are still struggling better for them to address those issues first so they can retain their loyal investors and attract more in the future.

comments.author: Frengki_cisco
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 12, 2022, 06:36:36 AMGala games are working towards Gala Music and Gala Movies do you think that this project can hit 1$ per token some day? I dont see any slacking with their development.GALA once touched $0.8 for the past nine months, but now Gala is priced at $0.06/coin, this requires full support to reach $1 from various parties, especially investors and the team.But I doubt the gala will make it past $1, considering the Max Supply is not recorded, this is a bit of a stretch to support the gala, unless they have local investors in the body of the gala, that's a possibility, but not sure.

comments.author: Reid
comments.body: It's possible. I mean, I believe it can. You said it right, they are not slacking. They keep on innovating and finding ways to broaden the length of possibilities in injecting cryptocurrencies to where they are good at. Until now, I am playing Townstar and it doesn't even get me bored. Gala Music and Movies are unknown to me right now, but their gaming platform is way better than other NFT games that I encountered and that's why I stayed. I cannot find a better one yet.

comments.author: CryptoATM
comments.body: Gala games is the first play to earn project I invested money on when BTC dips to 17k, I got mine around 0.049$, the max supply is also a concern for me but there are big projects in crypto space with no max supply and they have big value over the past years, I won't let this be the reason not to invest.Their discord is so much alive and they don't play around with their development, that's all I need from good project.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: I doubt if that will be happening. ATH was almost touching $1 but it needs more than only just gala music or movies. I know that gala may have vision to be the same platform like network for crypto users but i doubt that if this will be related to the utility for gala token. The key was not on the what already developed by gala but once another bullish trend will come again and it may possible to happen

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 12, 2022, 06:36:36 AMGala games are working towards Gala Music and Gala Movies do you think that this project can hit 1$ per token some day? I dont see any slacking with their development.Nothing is impossible. Check all basis for a $1 price if feasible. Marketcap based on circulating supply and its correspondening volume on exchange. If a strong project is destined to go there then its not impossible. Development and series of upgrade is important on a certain project and use case is being polished. Tokenomics played a huge role on progress and if the ecosystem is alive and all in places. Even at higher price you could see gala tokens rise.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: I have never seen some token do everything in terms of different industries. It's nice to see the plans that they have, though. I never knew that they were planning something like that. Upon searching, it seems that it's pretty old. The article[1] is in February 2022, so there might be some less marketing since I haven't seen it or anything. If they manage to take over the different industries, they can be more than $1. References:[1] - https://blockworks.co/gala-games-to-plow-5b-into-nft-expansion-efforts-in-year-ahead/

comments.author: Widdop37
comments.body: Town star is addictive, also there are some games on gala games that looks very exciting, the truth is no one can tell how things will play out with gala games but instead of staying back its better to invest what you can afford to lose, when you see a project doing their best the chance of becoming a success is high.

comments.author: MetaMii
comments.body: Suppoman is still waiting for 0.015$ per gala before he start buying,¬†   he is so sure that Bitcoin will go down to 10k lol, I hope he is right üôèüôè

comments.author: Jancuki
comments.body: Nothing is guaranteed, unless there really is a major influencing factor that can reach that price. Indeed, from the point of view of Gala Games' goal which is to create a ‚Äúblockchain game that you really want to play‚Äù, we can conclude from this that this project is about gaming. Like most projects around games, it doesn't last too long. For example, the Theta token project, which until now has a lower token price.

comments.author: Wincob
comments.body: Quote from: MetaMii on August 12, 2022, 09:11:28 AMSuppoman is still waiting for 0.015$ per gala before he starts buying,¬†   he is so sure that Bitcoin will go down to 10k lol, I hope he is right üôèüôèIt's unwise to make plans according to a YouTuber strategy, those guys have the money to buy even when their target is not met, instead why don't you DCA down the road and wait for better days? You won't miss any opportunity this way.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Although it is possible, we do not know when the price of $1 will be reached. With the price now at $0.06, I think it will need more support from investors and traders to increase to $1. The highest GALA price was $0.8 9 months ago, while the current price is the lowest GALA price. So it will at least take more time to raise the price unless there is a pump from the team or investors that will attract a lot of traders to seek profit from the GALA. So if you have already invested in GALA, you have to be patient for a while.

comments.author: GelatikKembar
comments.body: Quote from: Vvang on August 12, 2022, 06:36:36 AMGala games are working towards Gala Music and Gala Movies do you think that this project can hit 1$ per token some day? I dont see any slacking with their development.GALA has indeed reached almost $1 in the 2021 bullish season, but you should know that the circulating supply of GALA is only 20%/30% of the total supply, and where the total is 35 billion tokens, of course that is a very large amount, to reach $1 again I sure it will be hard to GALA, unless they burn their coin supply massively.

comments.author: Gayong88
comments.body: I think it is very possible that the project can reach $1 per token although it will take some time anyway. Yes, Game Gala also made a big breakthrough with their newly released Whitepaper. They immediately followed up with the official Twitter account. All in all, this is one project that you should be keeping an eye on over the coming months.

comments.author: Orange89
comments.body: Maybe yes it can reach 1$ because of these reasonsGala Launched on 2018 an Eth based PlatformWithGALA their is a lot of positive think1 the project is already listed on big exchange like Binance with great partners supporting it so it had good support behind it 2.  the project had the great utility so you may consider it for buying you can play different games if you GalA token 3. ALL TIME High of GALA is 0.8$ ¬†4 The game is 100% free2 Play and with Gala token we can buy item and upgrade character or weaponsMain Concern with Gala1. The only think that concern me is the Total Supply of Gala that's huge of 38B ¬† 2. Gala Project haven't give good return to their investor so you think over it3. The Project is on Eth based so Ready for fees ¬†Last it is not buying Advice i shared my opinion only Personally i am holding the Gala coin in my Decenterlized Wallet worth around 1000$ who know the future

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: If the market ripes and its market cap surpasses the total supply limit of it then we'll see gala on $1. Maybe if the next bull run is really high and the market cap for the entire market cap does the job like more trillions of money coming in then everything can be of possibility.Also, if the team keeps on developing, soon more investors will appreciate and realize that there's really a working project on it.
